• THIS_DIR
  • SPINNERS_PATH
  • _hook
  • f
  • Spinners
   1 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
   2 
   3 """
   4 yaspin.spinners
   5 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
   6 
   7 A collection of cli spinners.
   8 """
   9 
  10 import codecs
  11 import os
  12 from collections import namedtuple
  13 
  14 import json
  15 
  16 
  17 THIS_DIR = os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__))
  18 SPINNERS_PATH = os.path.join(THIS_DIR, "data/spinners.json")
  19 
  20 
  21 def _hook(dct):
  22     return namedtuple("Spinner", dct.keys())(*dct.values())
  23 
  24 
  25 with codecs.open(SPINNERS_PATH, encoding="utf-8") as f:
  26     Spinners = json.load(f, object_hook=_hook)
